identity.archetype: Archetype 4: Swiss & High-Contrast (Adapted for Dark Tech)
principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix Swiss precision with Cyberpunk depth.
Content is King: Data (speed, progress) is the hero.
Density: High information density for power users.
Contrast: High contrast for readability in dark mode.

headings.usage: Page titles, Section headers, Modal titles

mono.usage: File sizes, Download speeds, Hash strings, Time remaining

typography.installation: Import fonts via Google Fonts in index.css: @import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Chivo:wght@400;700;900&family=IBM+Plex+Sans:wght@400;500;600&family=JetBrains+Mono:wght@400&display=swap');

layout.spacing_scale: Generous (p-6, p-8) for containers, Dense (p-2, p-3) for data tables.
layout.grid_system: Bento Grid for Dashboard Overview. 12-column grid base.

sidebar.behavior: Collapsible on mobile, fixed on desktop.

buttons.style: Sharp or slightly rounded (rounded-md). High contrast hover states.

cards.style: Flat background (bg-card) with 1px border (border-border). No heavy shadows.

tables.typography: text-sm for data, font-mono for metrics.

visual_enhancers.glassmorphism: Use backdrop-blur-md for sticky headers and sidebar.
visual_enhancers.borders: 1px solid borders are preferred over shadows for depth in dark mode.
visual_enhancers.micro_interactions: Hover on table rows highlights the row. Buttons have click feedback.

icons.style: Stroke width 1.5px or 2px. Consistent sizing (w-4 h-4 for dense UI, w-5 h-5 for nav).
icons.usage: Use icons to reinforce actions (Download, Pause, Delete, Search).

universal_guidelines: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients.
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur).
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all. This results in breaking transforms. Always add transitions for specific interactive elements like button, input excluding transforms.
You MUST NOT center align the app container, ie do not add .App { text-align: center; } in the css file. This disrupts the human natural reading flow of text.
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations & color relevant to the app style.
NEVER: use AI assistant Emoji characters like ðŸ¤–ðŸ§  etc for icons.
Every interaction needs micro-animations - hover states, transitions, parallax effects, and entrance animations. Static = dead.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable. Cramped designs look cheap.
Subtle grain textures, noise overlays, custom cursors, selection states, and loading animations: separates good from extraordinary.
All interactive and key informational elements MUST include a data-testid attribute to facilitate robust automated testing.
instructions_to_main_agent: Implement the design using the provided palette and typography. Focus on the 'My Torrents' table being the centerpiece - it must be highly functional, dense, and readable. Use the 'Bento' grid for the Dashboard stats (Download Speed, Upload Speed, Active Torrents). Ensure all text is in French.
